texts: Your accredited breakdown discount is due to expire.
If your company holds a valid PAS 43 certificate you can renew the discount for another year.
You will need to pay £10 for every vehicle currently active on the discount.
What evidence do I need to supply for this renewal application?
You need to provide a copy of:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["The company’s BS EN ISO 9001:2008 certification document","Evidence of compliance with PAS 43 standards (the BS EN ISO 9001:2008 should state this)"]}
